title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI option in the ControlExampleText, the application emits a Windows 'ding' sound.
EB: I expect the application to not emit any sound when choosing SWT.MULTI.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Navigate to the 'Text' tab.
3. Select the 'Style' dropdown menu.
4. Choose the 'SWT.MULTI' option.
